dataConfig.script: function skill_keywords(row) { var name = row.get('user_id'); var value = row.get('keywords'); row.put('keywords_s', value); return row; }

entity.name: wiki_page
entity.query: select page_id as id, name, group_id, contents, creation_time as created, modified_time as modified from cem_objects

entity.name: groups
entity.query: select group_name, unix_group_name, is_public from groups where group_id = '${component.group_id}'

entity.name: wiki_categories
entity.query: select cat_id from wiki_pages_wiki_categories_join where page_id = '${wiki_page.id}'

entity.name: category
entity.query: select name as category_name from wiki_categories where cat_id = '${wiki_categories.cat_id}'
